title: Art Insights: Henri Matisse: The "Other" 20th Century Titan
hero_caption: Henri Matisse. Bathers by a River, March 1909/10, May–November 1913, and early spring 1916–October (?) 1917. Charles H. and Mary F. S. Worcester Collection, © 2018  …
description:
Art Insights is a free community program that provides an enlightening art-enrichment experience for older members of the community who are unable to visit the Art Institute in person. Join us for a fun discussion led by volunteer lecturer Dick Wright about the life and art of Henri Matisse.

*This community presentation is hosted by Arlington Heights Senior Center. For more information or to register, please contact Karie Van Grinsven at (847) 253-5532 ext. 305 or kvangrinsven@vah.com.
location: Arlington Heights Senior Center, 1801 W. Central Road, Arlington Heights, IL 60005
